revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The general history of China. Containing a geographical, historical, chronological, political and physical description of the Empire of China, Chinese-Tartary, Corea..."
revision.text: Possibly: The general history of China. Containing a geographical, historical, chronological, political and physical description of the Empire of China, Chinese-Tartary, Corea and Thibet. Including an exact and particular account of their customs, manners, ceremonies, religion, arts, and sciences. The whole adorn'd with curious maps, and variety of copper-plates. Done from the French of P. Du Halde. (Jean-Baptiste Du Halde). (London : Printed by and for John Watts at the Printing-Office in Wild-Court near Lincolns-Inn Fields, MDCCXXXVI. [1736]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2439630~S1
